channel.title: Matrix 718/724 Fully Fixed! Fix No Source Compile Errors! (Please Poll)
channel.description:
95 % Credits to Dragonkk For His Massive Release But Everyone in the moparscape community needs and wants this!! This is a guide for beginners on how to start your own matrix 718 !! First Download the Client, Source and cache from Dragonkk's Post!! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,552262.0.html
Now For The fix the errors are from the lib folder that dragonkk deleted!!! (BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD MAKE SURE YOU HAVE WINRAR TO EXTRACT THE LIB FOLDER INTO THE SOURCE!) Download Winrar From Here : http://www.rarlab.com Ok Now the Lib Folder!!! Download: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/61459989/lib.rar Just Incase People Wanted Here is a nortan scan of the lib folder! [IMG]http://i1094.photobucket.com/albums/i452/rentedo999/VirusScan.jpg[/img]
You Get No More Help Exept To Change The Client Ip Go To Loader.java In The Client And Find the ip address change it to 127.0.0.1 Gl With Your new 718!!!!!!
